summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5400 for the improvement of 40th Avenue Southwest, from West Frontenac Street to the south line of Gatewood Gardens Addition; by constructing watermains, together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 67203, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
